pullRequest.title: issue #823 - Add extended operations to the CapabilityStatement
pullRequest.bodyText:
Also added helper methods for constructing a Canonical from a uri and an optional version and/or fragment.
and some miscelaneous javadoc changes
Signed-off-by: Lee Surprenant lmsurpre@us.ibm.com

commit.message:
issue #823 - Add extended operations to the CapabilityStatement

Also added helper methods for constructing a Canonical from a uri and an
optional version and/or fragment.

and some miscelaneous javadoc changes

Signed-off-by: Lee Surprenant <lmsurpre@us.ibm.com>
